author: SearchlightRG
title: Holy Collectible Batman!
review: I actually received a replica of this set via the BIONICLEsector01 Facebook page in a contest, so didn't pay any actual money for it. However, it is most definitely a worthwhile addition to any fan's collection. There's not a component out of place in this set, and everything comes together to evoke everything I love about the Batman franchise. The build was excellent-not too challenging but no five-minute effort either-and the finished product is a joy to behold.
